name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】LET THIS RAIN SHAMAN SHINE YOUR DAY!! REAL NO FAKE 100%!! EHEK! #KoboKanaeru3D [8xF1xccpc98]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Title card for Kobo Kanaeru's 3D showcase with a countdown background music.
Kobo Kanaeru performs the song 'Silhouette' in a 3D beach environment while playing an electric guitar.

subtitles.original: Special Announcement! 3D SHOWCASE #KoboKanaeru3D
subtitles.english: Special Announcement! 3D SHOWCASE #KoboKanaeru3D

subtitles.original: October 27 (Fri) 20:00 WIB / 22:00 JST
subtitles.english: October 27 (Fri) 20:00 WIB / 22:00 JST

subtitles.original: シルエット
subtitles.english: Silhouette

subtitles.original: Lyrics・Composition：谷口鮪
subtitles.english: Lyrics / Composition: Maguro Taniguchi

subtitles.original: いっせーのーせで踏み込むゴーライン 僕らは...
subtitles.english: Ready, set, go! Stepping across the finish line...

subtitles.original: ...何も 何も まだ知らぬ
subtitles.english: ...We don't know anything, anything yet.

subtitles.original: 一線を越えて振り返るともうない 僕らは...
subtitles.english: Crossing the line, looking back, it's no longer there...

subtitles.original: ...何も 何も まだ知らぬ
subtitles.english: ...We don't know anything, anything yet.

subtitles.original: うまって うまって うまってく 煌めく汗がこぼれるのさ
subtitles.english: Sweat is pouring, pouring, pouring down, sparkling as it falls.

subtitles.original: 覚えてないこともたくさんあっただろう
subtitles.english: There must have been many things we didn't remember.

subtitles.original: 誰も 彼も シルエット
subtitles.english: Everyone, every one of them is a silhouette.

subtitles.original: 大事にしてたもの 忘れたふりをしたんだよ
subtitles.english: We pretended to forget the things we held dear.

subtitles.original: 何も ないよ 笑えるさ
subtitles.english: There's nothing left, we can just laugh.

subtitles.original: いっせーので思い出す少年 僕らは...
subtitles.english: Ready, set, go! Remembering the boy we were...

subtitles.original: ...何もかもを欲しがった
subtitles.english: ...We wanted everything.

subtitles.original: わかってるって あきづいてるって 時計の...
subtitles.english: I know, I've realized, the clock's...

subtitles.original: ...針は 日々は 止まらない
subtitles.english: ...hands, the days won't stop.

subtitles.original: うまって うまって うまってく 流れる時を時々 遠くにあって
subtitles.english: Drowning, drowning, drowning, the flowing time is sometimes far away.

subtitles.original: 覚えてないこともたくさんあっただろう
subtitles.english: There must have been many things we didn't remember.

subtitles.original: 誰も 彼も シルエット
subtitles.english: Everyone, every one of them is a silhouette.

subtitles.original: 恐れて回ること 知らぬふりをしてるのさ
subtitles.english: We're pretending not to know about turning in fear.
